Header: Thiem overpowers Simon at Paris Masters
Content: Dominic Thiem swept aside Gilles Simon at the Paris Masters in just under an hour and a half on Wednesday (October 31). The Austrian has now won seven matches in a row against his French rival, who he broke five times in the match.Although both players struggled to find their rhythm on their first serve Thiem produced 20 winners through the match and won the first set 6-4 before storming the second 6-2.Thiem now goes on to the round of 16 where heâ€™ll face Borna Coric, who beat Daniil Medvedev in straight sets 6-4, 6-4.
